nameEntry_newscore.text: Congratulations! You have a new high score on the Xbox Live leaderboards!!

nameEntry_signin.text: Congratulations! You have a new high score!! Press the Xbox Guide Button to sign in to Xbox Live to post your score!!

tutorial_marathon_text.text: The classic Hexic! Can you make a cluster out of the elusive black pearls?

tutorial_timed_text.text: It's you against the clock. Work fast before time runs out!

tutorial_survival_text.text: Plan your moves carefully, and try to clear the board!

tutorial_tips_text.text: Get tips and tricks for mastering Hexic!

mara_1_body1.text: Highlight three adjacent pieces. Press A to rotate the group clockwise, or press X to rotate it counterclockwise. Or, pull either trigger to rotate the pieces. The pieces will continue to rotate until one of them touches two matching pieces or until they return to their original positions.

mara_1_body2.text: If any of the pieces touches two matching pieces, the cluster disappears from the board, and the pieces above it fall.

mara_2_body1.text: Form clusters using bonus star pieces for extra points.

mara_2_body2.text: Beware of bombs! Each move you make causes the bomb to count down. Use the bomb in a cluster before its counter reaches zero, or it's game over.

mara_3_body1.text: For extra points, surround one piece with six same-color pieces to create a starflower. A starflower rotates your pieces in a whole new way!

mara_3_body2.text: Surround one piece with six starflower pieces. The starflowers disappear, and the center piece turns into a special black pearl!

mara_3_body3.text: Create a cluster or a flower of black pearls to win the game!

time_1_body1.text: Highlight three adjacent pieces. Press A to rotate the group clockwise, or press X to rotate it counterclockwise. Or, pull either trigger to rotate the pieces. The pieces will continue to rotate until one of them touches two matching pieces or until they return to their original positions.

time_1_body2.text: If any of the pieces touches two matching pieces, the cluster disappears from the board, and the pieces above it fall.

time_2_body1.text: Watch the timer! Creating clusters adds time, but wasted moves take time away!

time_2_body2.text: Form clusters using bonus star pieces for extra points.

time_3_body1.text: Surround one piece with six same-color pieces to create a starflower. Creating a starflower resets your time and expands your timer!

surv_1_body1.text: Highlight three adjacent pieces. Press A to rotate the group clockwise, or press X to rotate it counterclockwise. Or, pull either trigger to rotate the pieces. The pieces will continue to rotate until one of them touches two matching pieces or until they return to their original positions.

surv_1_body2.text: If any of the pieces touches two matching pieces, the cluster disappears from the board, and the pieces above it fall.

surv_1_body3.text: Form clusters using bonus star pieces for extra points.

surv_1_body4.text: Clear the board completely to win!

surv_2_body1.text: Cleared pieces are not replaced with new ones. Keep making clusters until you are out of moves. When you are out of moves, the remaining pieces lock into place and new pieces drop to start the next round.

surv_2_body2.text: Be careful! The game ends when the board is full of locked pieces!

surv_3_body1.text: You cannot move locked pieces. However, you can use them to create clusters.

surv_3_body2.text: Create a cluster of bonus star pieces to unlock all the pieces surrounding that cluster.

surv_3_body3.text: When you create a flower, all pieces matching the color of the flower's center are removed from the board and all locked pieces are unlocked.

tip_1_body2.text: Bonus star pieces do not have to be the same color in order to create a cluster.

tip_1_body3.text: Look for same-colored pieces that are forming a partial flower. Then, maneuver other same-colored pieces into place to create a complete flower.

tip_1_body4.text: Don't create clusters beneath the flower you are trying to create. The flower pieces will fall out of position, and you will have to start over.

tip_2_body2.text: If you're having trouble distinguishing between the different colors, you can add a pattern to the pieces. Go to the Options menu, and switch the Pattern option to On.

tip_3_body2.text: Don't let your starflowers drop to the bottom of the board. You will have difficulty using them to create black pearls.

tip_3_body3.text: Start making flowers early. It's easier in the earlier levels when there are fewer piece colors.

tip_3_body4.text: Clear bombs first! When a bomb appears, waste no time in clearing it from the board.

tip_3_body5.text: Make and clear clusters below a bomb. This helps you move the bomb next to two same-colored pieces so you can form a cluster.

tip_4_body2.text: In Timed Mode, work quickly, but be sure to form clusters with each rotation. Wasted rotations take time off the clock!

tip_4_body3.text: Check out all the tips for Marathon Mode. They apply to Timed Mode as well!

tip_5_body2.text: Clear the edges of the puzzle first.

tip_5_body3.text: Avoid forming high columns of locked pieces.

tip_5_body4.text: Concentrate on clearing locked tiles whenever possible.

tip_5_body5.text: Create clusters of bonus pieces to free any locked pieces surrounding that cluster.

tip_5_body6.text: Make a flower to unlock all locked tiles and to clear all tiles that are the same color as the flower's center.

Tip_0_Text.text: Highlight three adjacent pieces. Press A to rotate the group clockwise, or press X to rotate it counterclockwise. Or, pull either trigger to rotate the pieces. The pieces will continue to rotate until one of them touches two matching pieces or until they return to their original positions.

Tip_1_Text.text: Form clusters using bonus star pieces for extra points. Find out what happens when you match three bonus pieces of any color!

Tip_2_Text.text: Beware of bombs! Each move you make causes the bomb to count down. Use the bomb in a cluster before its counter reaches zero, or it's game over.

Tip_3_Text.text: Create a flower for bonus points! If you haven't tried this yet, surround one piece with six same-color pieces to create a starflower. A starflower rotates your pieces in a whole new way!

Tip_4_Text.text: Create a cluster of same-colored pieces using a bomb and at least one bonus piece. All pieces of that color disappear from the board!

Tip_5_Text.text: Surround one piece with six starflower pieces. The starflowers disappear, and the center piece turns into a special black pearl!

Tip_6_Text.text: You've reached the final level! Create a cluster or a flower of black pearls to win the game!

Tip_Survival_Text.text: Make clusters to remove pieces from the board. Clear the board completely to win! Be careful! Any pieces you can't remove will be locked into place for the next level. Make clusters with bonus stars to unlock adjacent pieces.

Leaderboard_NoScoreFriends_Text.text: Your friends are not yet ranked on this leaderboard.

Leaderboard_NoScoreYou_Text.text: You are not yet ranked on this leaderboard.

Leaderboard_NoScores_Text.text: No scores have been posted to this leaderboard.

Leaderboard_Error_Text.text: Leaderboard info is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

notsignedintolive_text.text: You need to sign in to the Xbox Live service to view or upload to leaderboards. Press the Xbox Guide Button to sign in now, or press B to go back.

resumegame_marathon_body.text: Do you want to continue your last Marathon game or start a new game? Remember, if you start a new game your previous Marathon game will be lost.

resumegame_timed_body.text: Do you want to continue your last Timed game or start a new game? Remember, if you start a new game your previous Timed game will be lost.

resumegame_survival_body.text: Do you want to continue your last Survival game or start a new game? Remember, if you start a new game your previous Survival game will be lost.

startup_profile_text.text: You must sign in to a profile to play.

startup_signedout_text.text: You signed out of your profile, and your game progress was lost.

main_standardtooltip_text.text: Keep one move ahead of the bombs!

main_timedtooltip_text.text: Hurry up... The timer's counting down!

main_survivaltooltip_text.text: Unused pieces lock into the board!

main_optionstooltip_text.text: Change your settings, and see who made this game.

main_tutorialtooltip_text.text: Learn to play, and discover clever strategies.

main_leaderboardtooltip_text.text: View high scores on Xbox Live.

main_exittooltip_text.text: Quit Hexic and go back to the Arcade menu.

main_achievementstip_text.text: Show off the awards you've earned.

nohd_body_text.text: Hexic HD must be played from an Xbox 360 Hard Drive. Please turn off your Xbox 360 console and attach an Xbox 360 Hard Drive before playing.

fileio_read_body_text.text: Hexic is unable to read your game progress and settings at this time. Please press A to continue.

fileio_write_body_text.text: Hexic is unable to save your game progress and settings at this time. Please press A to continue without saving.
